biography.bio: Gerlinde Locker was born on April 28, 1938 in Linz, Austria. She is an actress, known for Rouge rubis (2013), Geld.Macht.Liebe (2009) and In the Morning at Seven the World Is Still in Order (1968). She has been married to Richard Rüdiger since 1974. She was previously married to Kurt Wilhelm.
biography.name: Gerlinde Locker

biography.bio: Born in Vienna, Austria, following Matura at Wiener Oberrealschule studied for 1 year music (violin) before moving on to absolve the Max-Reinhardt-Seminar (1945/46) His first parts were on "Theater an der Josefstadt, Vienna". He is now married the third time and is father of 7 children.
biography.name: Gerhard Riedmann

biography.bio: Herta Talmar is an actress, known for Der Vetter aus Dingsda (1960), The Empress (1962) and Gasparone (1962).
biography.name: Herta Talmar

biography.bio: Franz Fehringer is an actor, known for Der Bettelstudent (1961), The Empress (1962) and Der Vetter aus Dingsda (1960).
biography.name: Franz Fehringer

biography.bio: Hans Thimig was born on July 27, 1900 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and director, known for Das Apostelspiel (1963), The Story of Vickie (1954) and Der Ausflug in die Seligkeit (1922). He was married to Helene Rauch and Christl Mardayn. He died on February 17, 1991 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Hans Thimig

biography.bio: Carl Brückel was born on May 10, 1881 in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Die Laubenpieper (1963), The Empress (1962) and Verhör am Nachmittag (1965). He was married to Franziska Martha Elisabeth Behrendt. He died on October 17, 1980 in Freilassing, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Carl Brückel

biography.bio: Gretl Schörg was born on January 17, 1914 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Margarete Schörg. She is known for her work on Mam'zelle Cri-Cri (1955), La Chanson du vin nouveau (1953) and Woe to Him Who Loves (1951). She died on January 4, 2006 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Gretl Schörg

biography.bio: Rita Bartos is an actress, known for The Empress (1962), Der fidele Bauer (1962) and Gasparone (1962).
biography.name: Rita Bartos

biography.bio: Gerd Frickhöffer was born on November 21, 1913 in Tianjin as Gerhard Emil Karl Josef Frickhöffer. He was an actor, known for Percy Stuart (1969), Sergeant Berry (1974) and The Oil Prince (1965). He was married to Irene Korb. He died on July 5, 1980 in Baden-Baden, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany.
biography.name: Gerd Frickhöffer

biography.bio: Heinz-Maria Lins is an actor, known for Der fidele Bauer (1962), Das Märchen vom unzufriedenen Tannenbäumchen - Ein weihnachtliches Spiel (1968) and Gasparone (1962).
biography.name: Heinz-Maria Lins

biography.bio: Hans Hais is an actor, known for Einsteigen bitte! (1953), Die letzte Patrouille? (1956) and Wetterleuchten am Dachstein (1953).
biography.name: Hans Hais

biography.bio: Paul Neuner is an actor, known for Der Bettelstudent (1961) and The Empress (1962).
biography.name: Paul Neuner

biography.placeOfBirth: Krumau, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary [now Cesky Krumlov, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Ernst Waldbrunn was born on August 14, 1907 in Krumau, Bohemia, Austria-Hungary as Ernest Karl Anton Waldbrunn. He was an actor and writer, known for Die Flucht (1966), Lauter liebe Leute (1972) and Johanna geht... (1968). He was married to Elfriede Ott. He died on December 22, 1977 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Ernst Waldbrunn

biography.bio: Karl Schiebener is an actor, known for The Empress (1962) and Gasparone (1962).
biography.name: Karl Schiebener

biography.bio: Waltraut Haas was born on June 9, 1927 in Vienna, Austria as Waltraute Haas. She is an actress, known for Mon ami le clown (1955), Premier avril an 2000 (1952) and The White Horse Inn (1960). She was previously married to Erwin Strahl.
biography.name: Waltraut Haas
